verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] considering housing children of illegal immigrants who cross the U.S. border alone or get separated from their parents at military bases in the United States .

[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: considering] [ARG1: housing children of illegal immigrants who cross the U.S. border alone or get separated from their parents at military bases in the United States] .

The Trump administration is considering housing children of [ARG0: illegal immigrants] [R-ARG0: who] [V: cross] [ARG1: the U.S. border] [ARGM-MNR: alone] or get separated from their parents at military bases in the United States .

The Trump administration is considering housing children of [ARG1: illegal immigrants] [R-ARG1: who] cross the U.S. border alone or [V: get] [ARG2: separated from their parents at military bases in the United States] .

The Trump administration is considering housing children of [ARG1: illegal immigrants] [R-ARG1: who] cross the U.S. border alone or get [V: separated] [ARG2: from their parents] [ARGM-LOC: at military bases in the United States] .
